thread.title: Four men arrested after murder in Lewisham
thread.title_full: Four men arrested after murder in Lewisham | London - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Four men arrested after murder in Lewisham
text:
A murder investigation has been launched after a 21-year-old man was stabbed to death in Lewisham yesterday afternoon.
Police were called at 3.45pm to a disturbance on Lambscroft Avenue. They found a man with stab injuries on nearby Charlesfield.
Officers and paramedics from the air ambulance and London Ambulance Service gave first aid, but the victim died in the street.
Police are informing the man's family.
Credit: Google Streetview Four men aged 16, 18, 19 and 20 were arrested close the scene. They are being questioned in custody at south London police stations.
Anyone with information should contact detectives on 020 8721 4812 or via 101.
To give information anonymously contact Crimestoppers on 0800 555 111 or go to crimestoppers-uk.org
Last updated Sat 25 Feb 2017
